programme.title: Confidential Assignment
programme.desc: A North Korean detective (Hyun Bin) works with his South Korean counterpart (Yoo Hae-jin) to take down a crime boss (Ju-hyuk Kim)

programme.title: Overdrive
programme.desc: Action. A notorious crime boss forces two legendary car thieves to steal a vehicle to win back their freedom. Joined by two beautiful women, the team has one week to pull off the daring heist or risk losing everything, including their lives

programme.title: The Quiet Hour
programme.desc: Drama. In a rural part of post-apocalyptic England occupied by alien invaders, a feisty teenage girl fights against bandits to save her family farm

programme.title: Flight World War II
programme.desc: In this imaginative time travel action-thriller, a modern commercial airplane goes through a patch of turbulence and is somehow transported directly into an aerial dogfight between the Axis and Allied powers. Faran Tahir, Robbie Kay, Aqueela Zoll star

programme.title: Boone: The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Action. When fame-seeking reality show bounty hunter, Boone (John Hennigan), attempts to bring down a drug lord and his empire, he uncovers more than he bargains for and learns that justice means more than ratings

programme.title: The Charnel House
programme.desc: Horror. In an urban neighbourhood that is being gentrified, a long-abandoned slaughterhouse is transformed into a complex of modern lofts. Soon after tenants move in, they find themselves being tormented by a dark secret from 30 years ago

programme.title: Shut In
programme.desc: A heart-pounding thriller with Naomi Watts and Oliver Platt about a widowed child psychologist who lives in an isolated existence in rural New England. Caught in a deadly winter storm, she must find a way to rescue a young boy before he disappears forever

programme.title: Colossal
programme.desc: Action Comedy starring Anne Hathaway and Jason Sudeikis. A woman discovers that severe catastrophic events are somehow connected to the mental breakdown from which she's suffering

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Action. Patrick Bergin, Uma Thurman. After Saxon nobleman Robert Hode (Bergin) confronts Sir Folcanet about his cruel aggression against villagers, Folcanet demands that Baron Daguerre punish Hode. but he escapes to Sherwood Forest where he becomes Robin Hood

programme.title: Moonstrap: Target Earth
programme.desc: Action. An ancient spacecraft is discovered on Earth, left behind by an advanced human civilization. A young woman studying the ship suddenly finds herself transported to the moon

programme.title: SuperBob
programme.desc: Action comedy, Brett Goldstein, Catherine Tate, Natalia Tena. Robert Kenner, a mild mannered postman from London was struck by a meteor which bestowed him with super powers. Today, Bob is an overworked under-appreciated civil servant who has his first date in six years

programme.title: Cold Moon
programme.desc: Crime and drama. The granddaughter of Clark’s character is murdered by a mysterious assailant, her body sunk into the black waters of the Styx River- where her parents disappeared from their boat a decade earlier. Suspicion falls on a duplicitous banker and his father

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: Action thriller with Val Kilmer as a spy and master of disguise, who is hired to steal a secret scientific formula for a Russian leader, only to fall in love with the professor who invented it (Elisabeth Shue)

programme.title: Striking Distance
programme.desc: Since testifying against his partner, life has been hell for Tom Hardy, and it gets worse when a serial killer murders his chief of homicide's father. Action with Bruce Willis

programme.title: Flu
programme.desc: Action thriller. Chaos ensues when a lethal, airborne virus infects the population of a South Korean city less than 20 kilometers from Seoul

programme.title: Back In The Day
programme.desc: Drama. Two gangsters (Michael Madsen, Alec Baldwin) and a trainer (Danny Glover) help a young man (William DeMeo) realise his dream of becoming a professional boxer

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: A hapless chauffeur is transformed into a secret agent when he tries on a special tuxedo that gives special abilities to whoever is wearing it. High-octane action with Jackie Chan and Jennifer Love Hewitt

programme.title: The Admiral: Roaring Currents
programme.desc: Action drama which follows the famous 1597 Battle of Myeongryang during the Japanese invasion of Korea, where the iconic Joseon admiral Yi Sun-sin managed to destroy a total of 133 Japanese warships with only 13 ships remaining in his command

programme.title: Vengeance: A Love Story
programme.desc: Action and Thriller starring Nicolas Cage and Anna Hutchison. A Gulf War veteran seeks vengeance against those who assaulted a single mother

programme.title: Overboard
programme.desc: Comedy with Goldie Hawn, Kurt Russell. When a snooty heiress falls overboard her yacht and develops amnesia, the redneck carpenter she haughtily dismissed without payment decides to seek his revenge and remedy his own domestic problems by claiming her as his wife

programme.title: LA LA Land
programme.desc: Musical with Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone. An aspiring actress and a jazz musician, scraping by playing cocktail party gigs in dingy bars, are faced with decisions as success mounts that begin to fray the fragile fabric of their love affair

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: In 1933 New York, an overly ambitious movie producer coerces his cast and hired ship crew to travel to mysterious Skull Island, where they encounter Kong, a giant ape. Adventure with Naomi Watts and Jack Black

programme.title: Barton Fink
programme.desc: Coen Brothers' black comedy set in 1941. Despising Hollywood and everything it stands for a playwright (John Turturro) with an acute case of writer's block is plunged into a surreal nightmare. John Goodman co-stars

programme.title: Fences
programme.desc: Drama. Denzel Washington directs and stars. In 1950s Pittsburgh, Troy Maxson struggles to raise his family while trying to transcend the bitter experience of being a talented baseball player denied the opportunity to play in the majors because of his race

programme.title: Who Gets The Dog?
programme.desc: Comedy. A divorcing couple (Alicia Silverstone, Ryan Kwanten) battle over who gets custody of their beloved dog

programme.title: The Great Buck Howard
programme.desc: Comedy. Defying his father (Tom Hanks), aspiring writer Troy Gable (Colin Hanks) looks for a way to gain some meaningful life experience and so takes a job with Buck Howard (John Malkovich), a mentalist who hopes to reinvigorate his career by staging a big comeback

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy
programme.desc: Sci-fi comedy starring Martin Freeman, Sam Rockwell, Mos Def. Arthur Dent is a very ordinary man having a truly unusual day after discovering his best friend is actually an alien and that planet Earth is going to be destroyed by otherworldly forces

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: Two disgraced FBI agents go way undercover in an effort to protect hotel heiresses the Wilson Sisters from a kidnapping plot. Shawn Wayans and Marlon Wayans star in this Comedy

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: Thriller examining the mind of a noted anthropologist (Anthony Hopkins) awaiting trial for killing and injuring several Park Rangers in Africa and the young psychiatrist (Cuba Gooding Jr.) assigned to him who becomes entangled in the true history and nature of humanity

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: Thriller examining the mind of a noted anthropologist (Anthony Hopkins) awaiting trial for killing and injuring several Park Rangers in Africa and the young psychiatrist (Cuba Gooding Jr.) assigned to him who becomes entangled in the true history and nature of humanity

programme.title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot
programme.desc: Comedy drama with Tina Fey and Martin Freeman. In 2002, a cable news producer decides to shake up her routine by taking a daring new assignment in Kabul, Afghanistan. Dislodged from her comfortable American lifestyle, she finds herself in the middle of a war zone

programme.title: Much Ado About Nothing
programme.desc: In this Shakespearean frolic, directed by Kenneth Branagh, a spirited war between the sexes is overcome by a couple's mutual attraction and a sweet youthful romance is nearly destroyed by duplicity

programme.title: Barton Fink
programme.desc: Coen Brothers' black comedy set in 1941. Despising Hollywood and everything it stands for a playwright (John Turturro) with an acute case of writer's block is plunged into a surreal nightmare. John Goodman co-stars

programme.title: Fences
programme.desc: Drama. Denzel Washington directs and stars. In 1950s Pittsburgh, Troy Maxson struggles to raise his family while trying to transcend the bitter experience of being a talented baseball player denied the opportunity to play in the majors because of his race

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy
programme.desc: Sci-fi comedy starring Martin Freeman, Sam Rockwell, Mos Def. Arthur Dent is a very ordinary man having a truly unusual day after discovering his best friend is actually an alien and that planet Earth is going to be destroyed by otherworldly forces

programme.title: Django
programme.desc: Drama. Romani jazz musician Django Reinhardt (Reda Kateb) manages to survive in Nazi-occupied France due to his fame as a performer. However, he faces a difficult choice when he's asked to participate in Germany's propaganda efforts

programme.title: Shooting For Socrates
programme.desc: Comedy drama set in Belfast against the backdrop of the 1986 World Cup. It tells the story of a momentous time in Northern Ireland's football history through the eyes of players, fans and the media, following the lives of passionate supporters Arthur and Tommy

programme.title: Jack
programme.desc: Comedy drama with Robin Williams as a 10-year-old boy who has a unique aging disorder, making him look 40. Attending school his classmates tease him mercilessly until they realise the advantages of having him around

programme.title: The Ottoman Lieutenant
programme.desc: Drama starring Michiel Huisman and Hera Hilmar. The Ottoman Lieutenant is a love story between an idealistic American nurse and a Turkish officer in World War I

programme.title: Water For Elephants
programme.desc: Romantic drama with Reese Witherspoon and Robert Pattinson. A veterinary student falls for a married circus performer. Theirs is a love that could span lifetimes but the wrath of her husband threatens tragedy for all

programme.title: Paycheck
programme.desc: What seemed like a breezy idea for an engineer to net him millions of dollars leaves him on the run for his life and piecing together why he's being chased. Action from John Woo, with Ben Affleck and Uma Thurma

programme.title: Meet The Fockers
programme.desc: After Jack gives permission to Greg to marry his daughter, they travel to Miami to meet his parents who are as different from them as can be. Comedy with Robert De Niro, Ben Stiller, Dustin Hoffman and Barbra Streisand

programme.title: Meet The Fockers
programme.desc: After Jack gives permission to Greg to marry his daughter, they travel to Miami to meet his parents who are as different from them as can be. Comedy with Robert De Niro, Ben Stiller, Dustin Hoffman and Barbra Streisand

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: Gene Hackman, Anjelica Huston and Ben Stiller star in this offbeat comedy about a dysfunctional family reunion where the estranged father reappears, claiming to have weeks to live and a desire to reconnect with his family

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Action with Steve McQueen and Charles Bronson. Seven American mercenaries are hired to protect a Mexican village, terrorized by the bandit Calvera (Eli Wallach) and his gun blazing goons. The bandits suffer casualties, but regroup to capture the seven gunmen

programme.title: Django
programme.desc: Drama. Romani jazz musician Django Reinhardt (Reda Kateb) manages to survive in Nazi-occupied France due to his fame as a performer. However, he faces a difficult choice when he's asked to participate in Germany's propaganda efforts

programme.title: Jack
programme.desc: Comedy drama with Robin Williams as a 10-year-old boy who has a unique aging disorder, making him look 40. Attending school his classmates tease him mercilessly until they realise the advantages of having him around

programme.title: Water For Elephants
programme.desc: Romantic drama with Reese Witherspoon and Robert Pattinson. A veterinary student falls for a married circus performer. Theirs is a love that could span lifetimes but the wrath of her husband threatens tragedy for all

programme.title: A United Kingdom
programme.desc: An inspiring true story, set in the 1940s, of Prince Seretse Khama of Botswana (David Oyelowo) and how his loving but controversial marriage to a British white woman, Ruth Williams (Rosamund Pike), put his kingdom into political and diplomatic turmoil

programme.title: Once Upon A Crime
programme.desc: Comedy. A woman (Cybill Shepherd) and an unemployed actor (John Candy) head to Monte Carlo to return a lost dachshund to its owner and collect a $5000 reward - but the dog's owner is murdered, and through a series of twists, the pair become prime suspects in the crime

programme.title: Out Of Africa
programme.desc: Romantic drama directed by Sydney Pollack starring Robert Redford and Meryl Streep. A Denmark native shares a marriage of convenience with a womanising baron. But when they move to Nairobi, she falls for a free-spirited hunter

programme.title: LA LA Land
programme.desc: Musical with Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone. An aspiring actress and a jazz musician, scraping by playing cocktail party gigs in dingy bars, are faced with decisions as success mounts that begin to fray the fragile fabric of their love affair

programme.title: Accepted
programme.desc: When a high school student is rejected by eight colleges, he starts his own university. Comedy starring Justin Long and Blake Lively

programme.title: Wild Hogs
programme.desc: A bored suburban husband convinces some of his pals to form a motorcycle gang. However, their masculine posturing is challenged when they cross a real gang called the Del Fuegos. Comedy with Tim Allen and John Travolta

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Based on the 80's TV action/drama, this movie focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined. Action with Colin Farrell and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Based on the 80's TV action/drama, this movie focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined. Action with Colin Farrell and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: Sci-fi action, Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn, Lance Henriksen. When contact is lost with the settlers who colonised the planet where her crew discovered the alien life form some fifty years earlier, sole survivor Ripley and a troop of marines are sent to investigate

programme.title: Once Upon A Crime
programme.desc: Comedy. A woman (Cybill Shepherd) and an unemployed actor (John Candy) head to Monte Carlo to return a lost dachshund to its owner and collect a $5000 reward - but the dog's owner is murdered, and through a series of twists, the pair become prime suspects in the crime

programme.title: LA LA Land
programme.desc: Musical with Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone. An aspiring actress and a jazz musician, scraping by playing cocktail party gigs in dingy bars, are faced with decisions as success mounts that begin to fray the fragile fabric of their love affair

programme.title: Winter People
programme.desc: Drama. Set in the Appalachians during the Depression, lonely widower Wayland Jackson (Kurt Russell) falls in love with Collie Wright (Kelly McGillis) and becomes involved in a family feud that is sparked by the existence of Collie's illegitimate son

programme.title: The Christmas Dragon
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure. Ayden, a young girl in Medieval Europe, is the only person who can save Christmas after a dying elf gives her a magic crystal. Ayden and other orphans must escape fantasy creatures to bring enchantment back to the North

programme.title: A Monster Calls
programme.desc: Drama, Sigourney Weaver, Felicity Jones. A boy attempts to deal with his mother's illness and the bullying of his classmates by escaping to a fantastical world

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: A FedEx executive must transform himself physically and emotionally to survive a crash landing on a deserted island. Adventure with Tom Hanks and Paul Sanchez

programme.title: Julie And Julia
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Meryl Streep and Amy Adams. Julia Child's story of her start in the cooking profession is intertwined with blogger Julie Powell's 2002 challenge to cook all the recipes in Child's first book

programme.title: Twilight
programme.desc: Fantasy drama starring Kristen Stewart and Robert Pattinson. When Bella Swan moves in with her father in the perpetually overcast town of Forks, Washington, she starts school and meets Edward Cullen, a mysterious classmate with a breath-taking secret

programme.title: Virtual Revolution
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller. In 2047, people spend all of their time inside virtual worlds. When terrorists threaten the virtual world, a hybrid seeking revenge is hired to eliminate them before they can take down the system

programme.title: Killer Toon
programme.desc: Crime and Horror starring Si-Young Lee and Ki-Joon Uhm. A series of murders resembling Ji-yoon’s horror webcomic drawings occur and detective Ki-chul unravels the terrifying truth of the comics himself

programme.title: Madtown
programme.desc: Drama starring Milo Ventimiglia. A young man, whose sister was imprisoned for killing their abusive parents has his life turned upside down when she gets out on parole and starts trying to control his life

programme.desc: Crime drama. Khali (Richard Cabral), a retired East L.A. hitman decides to take one last job, but everything falls apart when he develops empathy for the targets and is forced to make the toughest decision of his life

programme.title: The Model

programme.desc: Sci-fi drama. Eight friends at a dinner party experience a troubling chain of reality bending events due to the malevolent influence of a passing comet

programme.title: 47 Meters Down
programme.desc: Horror and Thriller. Two sisters on Mexican vacation are trapped in a shark observation cage at the bottom of the ocean, with oxygen running low and great whites circling nearby, they have less than an hour of air left to figure out how to get to the surface

programme.title: The Rezort
programme.desc: Horror. After a zombie outbreak, adventure seekers are invited to a luxury island resort where they can hunt the mindless undead on safari

programme.title: Somnus
programme.desc: Adventure. A crew working the Earth-Mars route has to change course after a ship malfunction. When the ship is forced to land on Somnus, a remote asteroid colony, they discover the colony is populated by a mysterious and sinister cult, hell-bent on dark plans for Earth

programme.title: Boys In The Trees
programme.desc: Fantasy drama. Alienated teens Corey and Jonah begrudgingly find themselves together on Halloween 1997, their last night of high school. They embark on a journey through their visceral memories, dreams and fears as they lay the ghosts of their past to rest

programme.title: Freddy Frogface
programme.desc: A funny and quirky animation for all the family about how Victor and his friends manage to outsmart the town bully and win the talent contest at the circus

programme.title: The Emperor's Secret
programme.desc: Animation. Familiar characters from a Finnish TV show star in this fairy tale where the inhabitants of a small village have to defend themselves against a despotic emperor

programme.title: Ploddy Police Car
programme.desc: Animation. Ploddy the Police car is assigned to guard an endangered eagle mother and her egg. However, when thieves steal the mother, Ploddy ends up hatching the egg under his hood and gets a lot busier than planned

programme.title: Twigson
programme.desc: Family film telling the delightful story of young boy who, having just moved to an old house in the country, finds an unusual friend in a twig

programme.desc: Comedy. A billionaire (Danny DeVito) catches a burglar (Martin Lawrence) and summons the police. An impulse to claim the thief's lucky ring as his own begins a game of one-upmanship from which neither party will yield

programme.title: Paris Can Wait
programme.desc: Comedy. Diane Lane, Alec Baldwin. While her movie-producer husband is preoccupied with work, Anne embarks on a road trip to Paris with her husband's business associate. Along the way, the pair enjoy fine food, humour and appreciate the sights of France

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: Comedy. A TV weatherman (Bill Murray) covering the annual Pennsylvania Groundhog Day finds himself in a time loop, repeating the same day again and again. After indulging in hedonism and committing suicide numerous times, he begins to re-examine his life and priorities

programme.title: What's The Worst That Could Happen?

programme.title: Made
programme.desc: Comedy. Two hapless best friends, Bobby (Jon Favreau) and Ricky (Vince Vaughn), get involved in a money-laundering scheme through a low-level organised crime group

programme.title: The Late Bloomer
programme.desc: Comedy. The story of a 30-year-old sex therapist (Johnny Simmons) who, after the successful removal of a benign brain tumor experiences all the changes and effects of puberty over a three-week period, all while desperately trying to win over the girl next door

programme.desc: Thriller. Midnight, New Year’s Eve: when all the hopes of new beginnings come to life– except for Lindsey and Jeff Pittman, whose strained marriage faces the ultimate test after they cover up a terrible crime and find themselves entangled in a web of deceit and madness

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Drama. In May 1940, the fate of Western Europe hangs on British Prime Minister Winston Churchill, who must decide whether to negotiate with Adolf Hitler, or fight on knowing that it could mean a humiliating defeat for Britain and its empire

programme.desc: Drama about words and loss. It tells the story of a family with an exceptional Scrabble vocabulary who cannot put their words to use and communicate with each other and their journey to reconnect. Bill Nighy and Jenny Agutter star

programme.title: Phantom Thread
programme.desc: Drama and romance starring Vicky Krieps and Lesley Manville. Set in 1950's London, Reynolds Woodcock is a renowned dressmaker whose fastidious life is disrupted by a young, strong-willed woman, Alma, who becomes his muse and lover

programme.title: I Feel Pretty
programme.desc: Comedy starring Amy Schumer. A woman struggling with insecurity wakes from a fall believing she is the most beautiful and capable woman on the planet. Her new confidence empowers her to live fearlessly, but what happens when she realizes her appearance never changed?

programme.desc: Comedy and drama starring Charlize Theron and Mark Duplass. A mother of three hires a night nanny to help with her newborn

programme.desc: Comedy. Jessica Miller (Sydney Bullock) is thrust into the real world when she graduates from college. To conquer this new world, she must discover her faith, open a box of memories and learn the simple secrets of life only a mother can share

programme.title: Road Less Traveled
programme.desc: Romance. Charlotte struggles to balance her upcoming wedding with her career. She searches for answers in her hometown, where she runs into her high school sweetheart, which prompts Charlotte to wonder what life would have been like if she'd never left

programme.title: Sometimes Always Never
programme.desc: Drama about words and loss. It tells the story of a family with an exceptional Scrabble vocabulary who cannot put their words to use and communicate with each other and their journey to reconnect. Bill Nighy and Jenny Agutter star

programme.title: Phantom Thread
programme.desc: Drama and romance starring Vicky Krieps and Lesley Manville. Set in 1950's London, Reynolds Woodcock is a renowned dressmaker whose fastidious life is disrupted by a young, strong-willed woman, Alma, who becomes his muse and lover

programme.title: I Feel Pretty
programme.desc: Comedy starring Amy Schumer. A woman struggling with insecurity wakes from a fall believing she is the most beautiful and capable woman on the planet. Her new confidence empowers her to live fearlessly, but what happens when she realizes her appearance never changed?

programme.title: Tully
programme.desc: Comedy and drama starring Charlize Theron and Mark Duplass. A mother of three hires a night nanny to help with her newborn

programme.title: Drone
programme.desc: Thriller with Sean Bean and Mary McCormack. Ideologies collide with fatal results when a military drone contractor meets an enigmatic Pakistani businessman

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Snipped In The Bud
programme.desc: Crime. A small-town florist (Brooke Shields) becomes a prime suspect in the murder of a former courtroom adversary

programme.title: Faith, Love And Chocolate
programme.desc: Comedy. Jessica Miller (Sydney Bullock) is thrust into the real world when she graduates from college. To conquer this new world, she must discover her faith, open a box of memories and learn the simple secrets of life only a mother can share

programme.title: Road Less Traveled
programme.desc: Romance. Charlotte struggles to balance her upcoming wedding with her career. She searches for answers in her hometown, where she runs into her high school sweetheart, which prompts Charlotte to wonder what life would have been like if she'd never left

programme.title: Mum's List
programme.desc: Drama with Emilia Fox. A woman dying of incurable breast cancer creates a list of memories and lessons for the husband and sons she is about to leave behind

programme.title: Sometimes Always Never
programme.desc: Drama about words and loss. It tells the story of a family with an exceptional Scrabble vocabulary who cannot put their words to use and communicate with each other and their journey to reconnect. Bill Nighy and Jenny Agutter star

programme.title: Sweet Home Carolina
programme.desc: Drama. An overworked single mother from Los Angeles inherits a house in rural South Carolina. She and her daughters are forced to slow down and mend their deteriorating relationships

programme.title: My Little Pony: The Movie
programme.desc: Animation. After a dark force conquers Canterlot, the Mane 6 embark on an unforgettable journey beyond Equestria where they meet new friends and exciting challenges on a quest to use the magic of friendship to save their homeland

programme.title: Ultimate Goal
programme.desc: Sports drama following the number one ranked youth soccer team in America as they play professional soccer teams in the UK before returning for their final tournament together for the National State Cup Champions

programme.title: Mum's List
programme.desc: Drama with Emilia Fox. A woman dying of incurable breast cancer creates a list of memories and lessons for the husband and sons she is about to leave behind

programme.title: Black Panther
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Chadwick Boseman and Lupita Nyong'o .T'Challa, the new ruler of the advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must defend his land from being torn apart by enemies from outside and inside the country

programme.title: O (Othello)
programme.desc: Drama. An update of Shakespeare's 'Othello' with a young cast, set in an upper class prep school, & centered around basketball player Odin

programme.title: 4 Minute Mile
programme.desc: Drama, Kelly Blatz, Richard Jenkins, Kim Basinger. A troubled inner-city teen turns to track in order to escape a life of crime, enlisting the aid of a legendary former coach to train him for a race that could pave the path to a brighter future

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: STAR Movies offers an exciting and unique mix of the best films from around the world

programme.title: The Hurt Locker
programme.desc: Action drama starring Jeremy Renner. In the chaos of the Iraqi war an elite Army bomb squad unit must come together in a city where everyone is a potential enemy and every object a potential deadly bomb

programme.title: Foxcatcher
programme.desc: Docudrama about John du Pont, the schizophrenic millionaire who shot & killed his friend and Olympic gold-medal wrestler Dave Schultz before locking himself in his mansion for two days as police negotiated his surrender. Steve Carell, Channing Tatum, Mark Ruffalo star

programme.title: Schapelle
programme.desc: When 27-year-old Australian Schapelle Corby is arrested at Bali's Ngurah Rai International Airport for carrying 4 kgs of marijuana, she goes through a turbulent phase fighting her case in the court

programme.title: Keeping Up With The Steins
programme.desc: A family comedy about what happens when a Hollywood agent (Jeremy Piven) uses his son's bar mitzvah as a vehicle for outwitting and outspending his nemesis

programme.title: While We're Young
programme.desc: Comedy drama with Ben Stiller, Naomi Watts, Adam Driver and Amanda Seyfried. Fed up of their friends pressuring them into beginning a family, forty-somethings Josh and wife Cornelia meet young hipster couple Jamie and Darby. Is this the start of a beautiful friendship?

programme.desc: Biographical drama. The NSA's illegal surveillance techniques are leaked to the public by one of the agency's employees, Edward Snowden, in the form of thousands of classified documents distributed to the press

programme.desc: Nelly Karim, Ahmad Majdi. Eps 11; The series illustrates the story of two girls working in a ballet institute. Their friendship was affected by one of the guys who enter their lives. (R3)

programme.title: Ayyoub
programme.desc: Mustafa Shaaban; Mirhan Hussein. Eps 12; A drama series about young man recruited in bank. A plot is set and he goes to prison, what changes his view in life. After prison, his plans are revenge. (R3)

programme.title: Halaawat Al Dunia
programme.desc: Hind Sabri; Zafer `Abidin. Eps 11; Amina goes into a conflict when she discovers and fights cancer just before getting. married. (R3)

programme.title: Al-Husrom Al-Shami (Part 2)
programme.desc: Abbas Al-Nouri. Eps 11; In the process of resurrecting the Ottoman Empire that was accompanied by rebellions, the strain impacted Damascenes as they were forced to fight a war that wasn`t theirs. (R3)

programme.title: Hatha Al Masaa'
programme.desc: Iyaad Nassar;Arwa Jawdat. Eps 11; The series talks about many social issues with lots of developments to turn small events into big problems. (R3)

programme.title: Al Jamaa‘ah (Part 2)
programme.desc: Sabrin; Karim A`bed Al Aziz. Eps 8; The second part casting two main personalities from three different brotherhood phases Hassan Al Hodaiby and Sayyed Kotob in the most dangerous sixties period. (R3)

programme.title: Bil Hajem Al ‘aa'ilee
programme.desc: Yehya Al Fakhrani, Mirvat Amin. Eps 12; The serial revolves events around the former ambassador Nader played by Yehya Fakhrani in a highly comical setting. (R3)

programme.title: Reverie

programme.desc: The SWAT team tries to determine the next diamond dealer to be robbed by a group of highly organised thieves executing heists across downtown Los Angeles. When Hondo is emotionally affected by a suspect's death during the case, he seeks comfort from his mother, Charice

programme.title: Olive Kitteridge
programme.desc: Math teacher Olive Kitteridge attempts to help Kevin, a smart but timid student whose mother is suffering from depression. Her son Christopher isn't happy though. Henry goes on a hunting trip that concludes with a tragedy

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: With the vote of no confidence against Logan approaching, Roman attempts to sway a neutral board member, while Kendall shores up his "yea" votes. Logan arrives in Washington to meet with the president, but worries he's been snubbed following a last-minute cancellation

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Selina tries to finish her book. Selina and her staff prepare for her portrait-unveiling ceremony, while Jonah tries to weasel his way onto the guest list. Dan works on his onscreen-chemistry problem

programme.title: Flight Of The Conchords
programme.desc: Bret enlists Jemaine and Dave to help him try to land a girlfriend, while Murray regrets making Greg his scapegoat

programme.title: The Sunset Limited
programme.desc: Drama. A God-fearing ex-con (Samuel L. Jackson) saves a college professor (Tommy Lee Jones) from throwing himself in front of a train but struggles to grasp the man's despair during a series of philosophical debates

programme.title: A Number
programme.desc: Drama. Bernard 2 (Rhys Ifans) discovers he is a clone of his brother. His father, Salter (Tom Wilkinson), explains he agreed to an experiment to bring back his dead son. Bernard 1 is very much alive though, and unbeknownst to Salter the doctors made several clones

programme.title: Warm Springs
programme.desc: Biographical drama about U.S. President Franklin D. Roosevelt's (Kenneth Branagh) struggle with polio, his discovery of the Warm Springs, Georgia, spa resort and his work to turn it into a centre for the aid of polio victims, and his resumption of his political career

Sports drama set in the summer of 1961 as two of the strongest hitters in the major leagues, Mickey Mantle (Thomas Jane) and Roger Maris (Barry Pepper), find themselves neck and neck in a battle to break Babe Ruth's long-standing record for most home runs in a season

programme.title: A Lesson Before Dying
programme.desc: Drama telling the dramatic story of a black man in the 1940s, sentenced to death for a crime he didn't commit, and the teacher who counsels him as he awaits his execution. Don Cheadle, Cicely Tyson and Mekhi Phifer star

programme.title: Boycott
programme.desc: Dramatization of the events of the Montgomery bus boycott when an African-American woman named Rosa Parks dared to take an empty seat in the "Whites Only" section on a city bus, sparking one of the first major battles in the civil rights movement of the 50s and 60s

programme.title: Studs Terkel: Listening To America
programme.desc: From early radio and TV appearances to his definitive books on race and work, this portrait of one of America's most memorable storytellers ultimately suggests that perhaps Terkel's greatest talent was not talking, but listening

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: As Bob Lee finds himself torn between his thirst for justice and keeping his family together, Atlas pivots towards a new game plan, which will only expedite their mission

programme.title: Flight Of The Conchords
programme.desc: Unable to pay off their back rent, Bret and Jemaine move in with Mel and Doug. Murray, on the other hand, looks to cash in on a stage play about the Conchords' travails

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Selina takes a trip; Dan woos Jonah to get a coveted interview; Amy convinces Selina to put her in charge of a very disorganised Mike

programme.title: Wyatt Cenac's Problem Areas

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: The acclaimed series returns for a sixth season, providing the Emmy-winning comedian/actor/writer John Oliver a unique platform to offer up his deeply funny and profoundly necessary perspective on any number of social, political or existential issues

programme.title: Deadly Class
programme.desc: A coming-of-age story set against the backdrop of late 1980s counterculture following a disillusioned teen recruited into a storied high school for assassins, where a ruthless curriculum, vicious social cliques, and his own adolescent uncertainties may prove fatal

programme.title: Mr. Inbetween
programme.desc: Anger mismanagement and no such thing as Jesus. If you can't kill your own brother-in-law, who can?

programme.desc: Drama telling the dramatic story of a black man in the 1940s, sentenced to death for a crime he didn't commit, and the teacher who counsels him as he awaits his execution. Don Cheadle, Cicely Tyson and Mekhi Phifer star

programme.title: Studs Terkel: Listening To America
programme.desc: From early radio and TV appearances to his definitive books on race and work, this portrait of one of America's most memorable storytellers ultimately suggests that perhaps Terkel's greatest talent was not talking, but listening

programme.title: Mistrial
programme.desc: Drama. When an activist charged with the murder of two NYPD officers is found not guilty due to legal technicalities, the arresting detective (Bill Pullman) takes the judge, jury and defendant hostage and holds a new trial, presenting the evidence that was not allowed

programme.title: Real Women Have Curves
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring America Ferrera, Lupe Ontiveros, Ingrid Oliu. A humorous and warm-hearted look at a Mexican-American teenage girl coming of age in a boiling cauldron of cultural expectations, class constrictions, family duty, and her own personal aspirations

programme.title: For Love Or Country: The Arturo Sandoval Story
programme.desc: World-class trumpeter Arturo Sandoval (Andy Garcia) was a shining light in Cuba's jazz scene, but as his fame grew, so did his discomfort with Fidel Castro and the Communist leadership. This biographical drama charts Sandoval's career and his eventual flight to the U.S

programme.title: Miss Evers' Boys
programme.desc: Based on a shocking true story, this drama exposes a 40 year government-backed medical research effort to treat syphilis patients in Alabama which led to tragic consequences when government funding was withdrawn. Alfre Woodard, Laurence Fishburne, Craig Sheffer star

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Following the blast in D.C., Bob Lee attempts to put an end to Atlas once and for all, all while trying to salvage his marriage and tie up the remaining threads from his past

programme.title: Lucky Louie

programme.title: Something The Lord Made
programme.desc: Biopic bringing to life the story of two medical pioneers (Alan Rickman, Mos Def). While they work side by side, they do not walk the same paths in society, and one develops deep resentment that he's been given little credit for his contribution to a medical innovation

programme.title: On Freddie Roach
programme.desc: Series chronicling the daily activities of celebrated boxing trainer & International Hall of Fame inductee Freddie Roach as he works with elite fighters at his Wild Card Boxing Club, Hollywood, CA, all while fighting an ailment very likely linked to his own boxing past

programme.title: Fahrenheit 451
programme.desc: Sci-fi drama. In a dystopian future where books are banned and ordered to be burned, a so-called fireman (Michael B. Jordan) goes about his work without questioning motives. All this changes when he meets a young girl who makes him challenge his actions and convictions

programme.title: From The Earth To The Moon
programme.desc: The tragic death of Apollo's first three astronauts during a pre-launch test haunts the spacecraft's designers as they struggle to come to terms with what happened and find a way to save the moon programme

programme.title: Max & Ruby

programme.title: Zack & Quack

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: American Pickers follows two of the most skilled pickers, Mike Wolfe and his business partner, Frank Fritz, as they hunt down objects with historical and collectible pop culture value that have been long forgotten by their owners

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The Gambler returns to form in Huntington Beach. Rene gets on everyone's bad side, while Ivy's prospects are cloudy at best

programme.title: Storage Wars

programme.title: Brothers In Arms

programme.desc: A catastrophic war ends all forms of civilization on Earth. In the aftermath darkness, ignorance and chaos prevail. Eli, a former businessman, retains his upright principles and becomes a figure that fights for justice. At some point he is entrusted with the task of carrying a book that holds the secrets of civilization and thus becomes the guardian of mankind’s future

programme.title: The Expendables 3
programme.desc: Barney (Stallone), Christmas (Statham) and the rest of the team comes face-to-face with Conrad Stonebanks (Gibson), who years ago co-founded The Expendables with Barney. Stonebanks subsequently became a ruthless arms trader and someone who Barney was forced to kill... or so he thought. Stonebanks, who eluded death once before, now is making it his mission to end The Expendables -- but Barney has other plans

programme.title: Wild Card
programme.desc: Nick Wild is a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal professional skills and a personal gambling problem. When a friend is beaten by a sadistic thug, Nick strikes back, only to find out the thug is the son of a powerful mob boss. Suddenly Nick is plunged into the criminal underworld, chased by enforcers and wanted by the mob. Having raised the stakes, Nick has one last play to change his fortunes...and this time, it's all or nothing

programme.title: Big Game
programme.desc: When Air Force One is shot down by terrorists leaving the President of the United States stranded in the wilderness, there is only one person around who can save him - a 13-year old boy called Oskari, who happens to be in the same place where the president landed in an escape pod

programme.title: Knowing
programme.desc: This title is a sci-fi disaster film directed by Alex Proyas. The production stars Nicolas Cage among others. In 1959, children at William Dawes Elementary School in Lexington, Massachusetts are encouraged to put drawings representing their predictions of the future in a school time capsule that is to be opened fifty years later. One particular girl, Lucinda Embry, stands out. Rather than contributing a drawing, she instead places in the capsule a page that is full of unknown numbers. Fifty years later, in 2009, the time capsule is opened and John Kestler’s son takes home the page of numbers that was placed in the capsule by Lucinda. John Kestler soon realizes that the numbers are not at all random but rather represent the date, location and casualty numbers of every major disaster since then. John’s suspicions are confirmed when the numbers correctly predict a series of disaster. Although the disasters predicted thus far had been limited in casualties, the numbers predict one more disaster that will end the human race as we know it. Can John learn enough about the disaster in order to stop it before it takes place? Moreover, if the disaster cannot be prevented, what will humanity’s fate be post the disaster

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: The Barret family's peaceful suburban existence begins to violently unravel when an unimaginably deadly and menacing force relentlessly targets them

programme.title: Cowboys & Aliens
programme.desc: In 1873 a space ship lands in Arizona USA to take the Earth over only to be faced by the cowboys of the west where events unfold

programme.title: Super 8
programme.desc: In the summer of 1979, a group of friends in a small Ohio town witnesses a catastrophic train crash while making a super 8 film, they soon suspect that it was not an accident. Shortly after, unusual disappearances and inexplicable events begin to take place in town, and the local deputy tries to uncover the truth. Something more terrifying than any of them could have imagined

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: The film follows a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until a chance encounter with an acquaintance from Simon's high school sends their world into a harrowing tailspin

programme.title: The Basketball Diaries
programme.desc: This film is based on the true story of a New York teenager Jim Carrol (Leonardo DiCaprio), who dreams of becoming a basketball star. Despite his promising talent, Jim’s life begins to spiral out of control when he gets involved with a street gang and starts using drugs. When he loses a friend to cancer, his life falls further into an abyss and his friendship with Reggie becomes his only hope for escaping a life of addiction and crime

programme.title: Draft Day
programme.desc: The General Manager of the Cleveland Browns struggles to acquire the number one draft pick for his team

programme.title: Rush
programme.desc: A recreated depiction of the fierce rivalry between two highly skilled Formula 1 racers: a brash, young playboy, and a cool, calculating technical genius

programme.title: The Real Housewives Of Orange County 8
The Real Housewives Of Orange County 8
Doctor Strange
programme.desc: After his career becomes at stake, Dr. Strange (Benedict Cumberbatch) a genius arrogant surgeon, got a new life chance, where a great sorcerer trains and coaches him in order to protect the world from evil

programme.title: دروب
programme.desc: A suspense program in which the presenter gets involved in a dramatization of a realistic story and offers solutions to how can an individual deal with his inner problems

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: On board of Titanic the first class passenger Rose travels with her fiancé Cal and her mother, Ruth DeWitt Bukater. Ruth stresses on the importance of Rose's engagement to save them from their financial problems. As a result Rose tries to suicide by jumping off the ship. A drifter "Jack Dawson" stops her and the story starts. Rose lie to Cal saying that she was looking over the ship's edge in curiosity and that Jack saved her from falling. In order to him back his favor Cal invites Jack to dinner where it was very obvious Cal and Ruth dislikes for the young third-class man who secretly took Rose to the ship's third-class quarter party. However, Rose prefers Jack over Cal, she met him at the bow of the ship and went to Rose's stateroom where she asked Jack to sketch her nude wearing Cal's present the "Heart of the Ocean". Afterward, the two ran from Cal's bodyguard, goes to the ship's deck witnessing the ship's collision with an iceberg . They goes to warn Cal and Roses mother but unfortunately they find that Cal discovers Jack's drawing and let his bodyguard slip the necklace into Jack's pocket to accuse him of stealing it. Jack get arrested, taken down and handcuffed to a pipe. Rose runs away from Cal and her mother and releases Jack. Once Jack and Rose reach the deck, Cal persuades her to leave the ship and take another lifeboat, claiming that he has arranged for himself and Jack to get off safely. After she boards, Cal tells Jack that he surely deceived him. After the boat gets lower, she realizes that she cannot leave Jack, and jumps back on board " Titanic" leading Cal to chases them . He found it in vain so he returns to the boat deck and boards a lifeboat by pretending being a parent of a mother orphaned child. Jack and Rose return to the top deck. They find all lifeboats are finished; the ship starts to break in half and sinks. Jack helps Rose onto a wall panel only able to support one person’s weight. Holding the panel's edge, he asked her to forger about him and to continue he life. Meanwhile a lifeboat comes back to search for survivors. Rose got saved leaving her only true love in the bottom of the sea with "Titanic

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: On board of Titanic the first class passenger Rose travels with her fiancé Cal and her mother, Ruth DeWitt Bukater. Ruth stresses on the importance of Rose's engagement to save them from their financial problems. As a result Rose tries to suicide by jumping off the ship. A drifter "Jack Dawson" stops her and the story starts. Rose lie to Cal saying that she was looking over the ship's edge in curiosity and that Jack saved her from falling. In order to him back his favor Cal invites Jack to dinner where it was very obvious Cal and Ruth dislikes for the young third-class man who secretly took Rose to the ship's third-class quarter party. However, Rose prefers Jack over Cal, she met him at the bow of the ship and went to Rose's stateroom where she asked Jack to sketch her nude wearing Cal's present the "Heart of the Ocean". Afterward, the two ran from Cal's bodyguard, goes to the ship's deck witnessing the ship's collision with an iceberg . They goes to warn Cal and Roses mother but unfortunately they find that Cal discovers Jack's drawing and let his bodyguard slip the necklace into Jack's pocket to accuse him of stealing it. Jack get arrested, taken down and handcuffed to a pipe. Rose runs away from Cal and her mother and releases Jack. Once Jack and Rose reach the deck, Cal persuades her to leave the ship and take another lifeboat, claiming that he has arranged for himself and Jack to get off safely. After she boards, Cal tells Jack that he surely deceived him. After the boat gets lower, she realizes that she cannot leave Jack, and jumps back on board " Titanic" leading Cal to chases them . He found it in vain so he returns to the boat deck and boards a lifeboat by pretending being a parent of a mother orphaned child. Jack and Rose return to the top deck. They find all lifeboats are finished; the ship starts to break in half and sinks. Jack helps Rose onto a wall panel only able to support one person’s weight. Holding the panel's edge, he asked her to forger about him and to continue he life. Meanwhile a lifeboat comes back to search for survivors. Rose got saved leaving her only true love in the bottom of the sea with "Titanic

programme.desc: A linguist, Louise Banks, and a theoretical physicist, Ian Donnelly are asked by US Army Colonel Weber to join a team to find out why twelve extraterrestrial spacecrafts have appeared across the Earth.
